issues.title: Confusing login state
issues.description: No clear indication of successful login or current user; add explicit success, avatar/name, and header state.

issues.title: Inconsistent auth gating
issues.description: Some pages show auctions pre-login while others block. Standardize gating and show clear prompts.

issues.title: Password field present in passwordless flow
issues.description: Password input appears despite plan for one-time Discord code; contradictory and confusing.

issues.title: Register double-submit creates duplicates
issues.description: Double-clicking register can create a user then show 'already exists' with no helpful recovery.

issues.title: Dev-mode accepts any password
issues.description: Any password is accepted for login in development; ensure it cannot leak to production and is clearly labeled.

issues.title: Admin/demo login fails silently when backend is down
issues.description: No uptime/maintenance error surfaced; users just 'can't login'.

issues.title: Listing disappears after creation
issues.description: Start time often mis-set; no validation toast and no 'Expected/Queued' dashboard state.

issues.title: Date/time picker friction & timezone ambiguity
issues.description: Users 'mess up the date' easily; unclear timezone and defaults.

issues.title: End time incorrectly required
issues.description: Creation blocked when end time omitted; should be optional.

issues.title: Description min-length too strict
issues.description: Short but valid descriptions are rejected (e.g., 'this sheep is black'); improve rule and error message.

issues.title: Description renders as a single line
issues.description: Newlines ignored; preserve line breaks/paragraphs.

issues.title: Cannot edit upcoming listings (controls off-screen)
issues.description: Long description column causes horizontal overflow; edit/delete controls move off-canvas.

issues.title: Table horizontal overflow from long descriptions
issues.description: Forces users to scroll far right to find controls; clamp or wrap text and keep actions sticky.

issues.title: Unformatted large price numbers
issues.description: Raw numbers are confusing; display K/M/B or locale separators.

issues.title: Missing 'Add Balance' affordance
issues.description: Users expect an 'Add Balance' control and can't find it; either surface or indicate 'not available'.

issues.title: Photo upload flips theme
issues.description: Uploading images toggles Light/Dark mode unexpectedly.

issues.title: Cover photo select intermittently no-ops
issues.description: After a broken upload, 'Select cover' does nothing until image is removed/readded.

issues.title: Broken image has no placeholder/error
issues.description: Failed uploads leave a bad preview with no fallback indicator.

issues.title: Photo reorder/swap unreliable
issues.description: Reordering or swapping photos sometimes requires multiple attempts; racey state updates.

issues.title: Mail/messages UI is hard to discover
issues.description: Messaging is visually 'under the rug'; placement and styling hide it.

issues.title: Landing page font weight inconsistent
issues.description: First page typography looks too thick versus the rest of the site.

issues.title: Layout feels crowded on first use
issues.description: Information density and spacing make it feel 'clogged'.

issues.title: Sidebar/category tiles lack interaction
issues.description: Tiles are static; expected hover/expand behavior is missing.

issues.title: Poor mobile experience
issues.description: Header, cards, and forms render poorly on mobile sizes.

issues.title: Large desktop spacing/alignment issues (2560×1440)
issues.description: Needs spacing and layout QA at ultrawide/2K resolutions.

issues.title: Admin panel visual misalignment
issues.description: Admin UI elements don’t line up; visual glitches reported.

issues.title: Seller approval UI/logic mismatch
issues.description: UI implies all sellers need approval though it should be selective; confusing state.

issues.title: Missing trust copy on login
issues.description: No visible guidance like 'Don’t use your MC password' → users are skeptical.

issues.title: Bid history on auction pages
issues.description: Show bid count and last 4 bid amounts (anonymized). Exclude BIN-only items.

issues.title: Bid actions: retract / below BIN / with note
issues.description: Enable retracting bids; allow bids below BIN; optional short note (e.g., skin details).

issues.title: Default start time = Now; end time optional
issues.description: On create listing, prefill start with 'now' and make end time optional.

issues.title: Archive ended/sold listings
issues.description: Auto-move ended/sold to an Archive view and make them searchable.

issues.title: Inventory hover grid on item page
issues.description: Below description, show thumbnails with hover tooltips (enchanted/forged/recomb).

issues.title: Price formatting (K/M/B or separators)
issues.description: Display large values as 1.2M / 350K / 2.1B and/or with locale separators.

issues.title: Discord passwordless login
issues.description: One-time code via bot; remove password field from UI.

issues.title: Trust copy on login
issues.description: Add 'Don’t reuse your MC password' and 'Not a rat' reassurance on auth screens.

issues.title: Consistent auth gating
issues.description: Decide and apply site-wide whether browsing requires login; show clear prompts.

issues.title: Open messaging to any user
issues.description: Allow starting conversations with any user (not only current/previous counterparties).

issues.title: Advanced filters: armor piece/type/hex
issues.description: Add filters for armor piece, armor type, and hex color; support future priority tiers.

issues.title: Auto-ban sync with eCafe
issues.description: On Discord verification, bot checks Café ban/tradeban and auto-blocks access if flagged.

issues.title: Bid verification tiers
issues.description: Bidders are Pending by default; seller can verify. Auto-verify above rep threshold. Add filter for Verified-only bidders.

issues.title: Selective listing approval rules
issues.description: Only high-value categories/colors (e.g., Fairy/Crystal/Sup; specific hexes) require approval. Configurable in Admin.

issues.title: Admin moderation tools
issues.description: Ban/unban users, remove auctions, manage approvals, view reports/audit log.

issues.title: Interactive sidebar tiles
issues.description: Tiles expand/animate on hover/active to improve affordance.

issues.title: Mobile-first UI pass
issues.description: Refactor nav, cards, and forms for small screens; ensure touch targets and layout scale.

issues.title: 2560×1440 layout QA
issues.description: Tighten spacing/alignment for 2K/ultrawide. Test common breakpoints.

issues.title: Add Balance entry point
issues.description: Surface an 'Add Balance' control or clearly indicate 'Coming soon/disabled'.

issues.title: IRL marketplace separation
issues.description: Run IRL trades on a separate site/tab/server; share Discord SSO; keep coin marketplace isolated.
